articles.description: Mexican soccer star Raul Jimenez underwent surgery Sunday night after fracturing his skull during a Premier League game in London, his team confirmed.
articles.content:
Mexican soccer star Raul Jimenez underwent surgery Sunday night after fracturing his skull during a Premier League game in London, his team confirmed.

articles.title: Teddy Bridgewater: Panthers may have panicked late against Vikings - NBC Sports - NFL
articles.description: The Panthers had a chance to score a late touchdown that would have likely put the game out of reach for the Vikings. Instead, they threw an incomplete pass that left more than enough time for Minnesota to pull ahead and win, 28-27. The Vikings had taken thei…

articles.title: Arizona most likely option for 49ers' upcoming 'home' games - Comcast SportsNet Bay Area
articles.description: The Arizona Cardinals' home stadium is the likely choice for the 49ers' home for as long as they are locked out of Levi's Stadium.
articles.content:
The 49ers appear likely to relocate their "home" games to Arizona for as long as they are locked out of Levi's Stadium in Santa Clara.
